Posts.Content: Hi, I was diagnosed with breast cancer before Christmas. I have always been positive and even thrown a farewell to my left boob party, it’s just my way!!!  My results have come back ok but may still need chemotherapy & radiotherapy. I had a skin sparing mastectomy & reconstruction 2 weeks ago. I  went to my check up yesterday and was told skin doesn’t look to good and my implant may have to be removed and also more skin tomorrow. Feeling gutted is an understatement as having the implant fitted is what’s kept me going so I still kind of look normal in my eyes!!!
Posts.Title: Skin sparing mastectomy

Posts.Content: Thank you, I’m keeping everything  crossed
Posts.Title: Skin sparing mastectomy
